mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST (ID, TEST_NO, STEP, FIRST_TIME, FIRST_VALUE, FLUID, SERIAL_NO, LOCATION, MAKER, VELVE_TYPE, INLET_SIZE, OUTLET_SIZE, TEST_DATE, SET_PRESS, BACK_PRESS, COLD_PRESS, RESULT_SET_PRESS, RESULT_COLD_PRESS, RESULT_BACK_PRESS, RESULT_POP_PRESS, RESULT_LEAK_PRESS, RESULT_OK, ADJUST_SCREW, UPPERING, LOWERING, WORKER, INSPECTOR, MANAGER, CONF_PORT, CONF_BAUDRATE, CONF_SET_PRESS, CONF_SCAN_TIME, CONF_PRESS_UNIT, TEST_ID) VALUES (null, #{historyNo}, #{customerField}, #{typeField}, #{psvNo}, #{fluidField}, #{serialNoField}, #{locationField}, #{makerField}, #{pressureTypeField}, #{sizeInField}, #{sizeOutField}, #{testDateField}, #{setPressureField}, #{backPressureField}, #{coldPressureField}, #{resultSetPressureField}, #{resultColdPressureField}, #{resultBackPressureField}, #{resultPopPressureField}, #{resultLeakPressureField}, #{resultOKPressureField}, #{adjustScrewField}, #{upperingField}, #{loweringField}, #{workerField}, #{inspectorField}, #{managerField}, #{portConf}, #{baudrateConf}, #{setPressureConf}, #{scanTimeConf}, #{pressureUnitConf}, #{testId});
